DOC.brief_summary: Data collected from this study will be used to evaluate the performance of a monitoring algorithm.
DOC.brief_title: Novel Non-Invasive Monitoring Parameter in a Hospital Setting
DOC.detailed_description: The goal of this study is to assess equivalency, performance, and accuracy of a new monitoring algorithm in a hospital setting.
DOC.criteria: 1. Subjects 18 years old or older 2. Written informed consent from the patient or their legally authorized representative before initiation of any studyrelated procedures 3. Subjects on general care floor 1. Severe contact allergies to standard adhesive materials 2. Abnormalities that may prevent proper application of the device 3. Women who are pregnant or lactating 4. Subjects with significant arrhythmia
